thread.section_title: Hotel Mistral - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Experience!
thread.title_full: Great Experience! - Review of Hotel Mistral, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: wraceves
title: Great Experience!
text: We were here during our honeymoon in October, and had a fantastic experience! Quiet, historic, modern, and very friendly service. We were made to feel at home immediately, and as a fan of Jean-Paul Sartre, I really enjoyed staying in a building he called home. The room was compact but efficient, and the details made it special. We can't wait to return.
